message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I get $6000, you get $4000.  We both lose if we wait too long.
I think we can do better. Let's split it 60/40 in my favor.  We're both losing money each round, so let's get this done.
Bob, my offer is getting worse with time, but so is the pot. Let's be reasonable, $5500 for me, $4500 for you -  a better deal than waiting.
Alice, we're both losing money with each passing round. I'm willing to give you $3000, but I need the rest.  This is a much better deal than waiting any longer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's split it down the middle before we both end up with nothing!
